list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Update .gitignore, CompileBoom and RunCompiler.
Created a new .gitignore file in the nand2tetris-vm-translator-master directory to ignore compiled class files, log files, BlueJ files, package files, virtual machine crash logs and IDE files.
Updated the CompileBoom.java file to change the print command to pop and added additional functions for greater and lesser expressions, and while loops.
Updated the RunCompiler.java file to prompt for the name of the compiled file, and write and save the compiled code to the specified file.
Tested updated RunCompiler.java by inputting programs/add.boom as input file and saving the compiled file as programs/add.vm.
Translated add.vm using the VM-Translator from https://github.com/koddas/nand2tetris-vm-translator , outputting the translated file to new file called out.vm.

task.summary: Created project in IntelliJ for esoteric language BOOM. Installed ANTLR plugin and added ANTLR as a library for the project. Created grammar file 'Boom.g4' and defined first iteration of basic grammar for the language.

Created project in IntelliJ for esoteric language BOOM. Installed ANTLR plugin and added ANTLR as a library for the project. Created grammar file 'Boom.g4' and defined first iteration of basic grammar for the language.

Create 'programs' directory, 'RunCompiler.java', 'CompileBoom.java', and 'add.boom'
This commit encompasses several changes:
- Created a new directory named 'programs' dedicated to storing BOOM language programs. - Introduced the 'RunCompiler.java' file, responsible for running the compiler. Added basic user input handling. - Generated an ANTLR Recognizer. - Added the 'CompileBoom.java' file. Implemented CompileBoom as a listener. - Made adjustments to the 'Boom.g4' grammar file, including handling EOF, '!' statements, 'expr,' 'unaryExpr,' and 'addExpr.' - Created the 'add.boom' file for testing addition operations involving numbers and variables.
Refactor Boom.interp and Boom.g4, add program to add two numbers.

feat: Extend CompileBoom and RunCompiler classes
CompileBoom class has been extended with the addition of several import statements, and a large number of methods for handling context transitions in the BoomParser. This includes enterFile, exitFile, and similarly named methods for other elements in the grammar.
RunCompiler class now includes import statements for various ANTLR and Java IO classes. The main method now uses ANTLRInputStream to read from the input file, generates a token stream, and walks the parse tree.
BoomParser.java has been slightly refactored, with changes in ExprContext and AddExprContext.

feat(grammar): update grammar rules and simplify compiler code
This commit includes updates to the grammar rules in Boom.g4, changes the print statement to accept an identifier, and adds a missing newline at the end of file in add.boom. In addition, it simplifies the CompileBoom.java by removing unnecessary overridden methods and adds a method to generate compiled code. It also updates RunCompiler.java to use the new method in CompileBoom.java.
Changes: - Boom.g4: Updated grammar rules and changed print statement to accept an identifier instead of an expression. - add.boom: Added a missing newline at the end of file. - CompileBoom.java: Removed unnecessary overridden methods and added a method to generate compiled code. - RunCompiler.java: Updated to use the new method in CompileBoom.java to get compiled code.

feat(grammar): add comparison expressions to Boom.g4 grammar #master
Added new comparison expressions to the Boom.g4 grammar file. The expressions include greaterExpr and lesserExpr, defined with 'HMPH' and 'GULP' operators respectively. Also introduced a while loop construct using the 'ZOINKS' and '?!' tokens.
Generate an ANTLR Recognizer from the updated grammar file Boom.g4.

feat: Update .gitignore, CompileBoom and RunCompiler.
Created a new .gitignore file in the nand2tetris-vm-translator-master directory to ignore compiled class files, log files, BlueJ files, package files, virtual machine crash logs and IDE files.
Updated the CompileBoom.java file to change the print command to pop and added additional functions for greater and lesser expressions, and while loops.
Updated the RunCompiler.java file to prompt for the name of the compiled file, and write and save the compiled code to the specified file.
Tested updated RunCompiler.java by inputting programs/add.boom as input file and saving the compiled file as programs/add.vm.
Translated add.vm using the VM-Translator from https://github.com/koddas/nand2tetris-vm-translator , outputting the translated file to new file called out.vm.

MESSAGE.value: Created project in IntelliJ for esoteric language BOOM. Installed ANTLR plugin and added ANTLR as a library for the project. Created grammar file 'Boom.g4' and defined first iteration of basic grammar for the language.

- Created a new directory named 'programs' dedicated to storing BOOM language programs. - Introduced the 'RunCompiler.java' file, responsible for running the compiler. Added basic user input handling. - Generated an ANTLR Recognizer. - Added the 'CompileBoom.java' file. feat: Extend CompileBoom and RunCompiler classes
CompileBoom class has been extended with the addition of several import statements, and a large number of methods for handling context transitions in the BoomParser. This includes enterFile, exitFile, and similarly named methods for other elements in the grammar.

BoomParser.java has been slightly refactored, with changes in ExprContext and AddExprContext.

Added new comparison expressions to the Boom.g4 grammar file. The expressions include greaterExpr and lesserExpr, defined with 'HMPH' and 'GULP' operators respectively. Also introduced a while loop construct using the 'ZOINKS' and '?!' tokens.
Generate an ANTLR Recognizer from the updated grammar file Boom.g4.
